name: Manor of Deception (Prototype)
description:
This was a game made during the Mashup game jam

The theme was Cult Classics

I decided to use the game of Clue, and Maniac Mansion

This is a work in progress, but i believe it conveys what i am thinking

This was also my first time doing pixel art in a game and was a huge learning experience

You are not able to finish this game, this was a prototype made for a gamejam

The game development is on hold
